Package Model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    The Board class contains the methods and properties for initiailzing and progressing the game.

    Specifically, it includes the following private fields in implementing myEmpire :

    • Space[]
    • Player[]
    • totalPlayer
    • int turnIndex
    • int turnCount
    • Deck deck

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Board​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playerNames, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indices)
      Creates a Board object with the number of players in the game specified.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Returns the Deck object implemented during Board implementation

      Returns an array of Player containing the Player objects instantiated

      double playerTotalWorth​(Player player)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playerNames,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indices)
        Creates a Board object with the number of players in the game specified. The index of the turn is initialized to 0, while its count is initialized to 1.
        Parameters:
        playerNames - the total number of players
        indices - space indices to be instantiated to board

      • isEndGame

        public boolean isEndGame​(Bank bank)

      • getWinners

        public Player[] getWinners()
        This method validates if myEmpire has satisfied any of the conditions of ending. It returns a value of TRUE if at least one of these conditons are met. Otherwise, the return value is FALSE.

        Conditions of game ending are

        • a player does not have enough money to pay for rent, tax or fine; or
        • a player owns 2 full sets of properties with the same color; or
        • the bank is out of cash.
        Returns:
        TRUE if at least one of the conditions are satisfied.

      • playerTotalWorth

        public double playerTotalWorth​(Player player)

        This function returns the total worth of the player specified in the parameter.

        Total worth is computed by (Balance + Property Prices + Railroad Prices + Utility Prices)
        Parameters:
        player - : Player object to be computed for total worth
        Returns:
        the accumulated worth of the

        Player

        instance in the function argument

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Increments the turn index by 1 to identify which Player object is active.
